trans-unit.source: Provides a page adapter for the cHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供 cHTML 配接器集的頁面配置器。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: Adapters are usually constructed automatically by ASP.NET and must have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 配接器通常由 ASP.NET 自動建構，而且必須具有預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回適用於指定配接器的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: A text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: 適用於指定配接器的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequest" /> object that contains request information, such as HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: 包含要求資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequest" /> 物件，例如 HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: Source identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源識別項。

trans-unit.source: Argument identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的引數識別項。

trans-unit.source: Collection of postback data from the request object.
trans-unit.target: 來自要求物件的回傳資料集合。

trans-unit.source: Called to determine the postback data collection.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫以判斷回傳資料集合。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: A modified version of the <paramref name="baseCollection" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="baseCollection" /> 參數的已修改版本。

trans-unit.source: The current request context.
trans-unit.target: 目前的要求內容。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: 評估裝置配接器集是否適用於指定的要求。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the device adapter set applies to the specified request; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果裝置配接器集套用至指定的要求，則為<see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Class
trans-unit.target: 類別

trans-unit.source: Returns
trans-unit.target: Returns

trans-unit.source: Preferred rendering type
trans-unit.target: 慣用的轉譯型別

trans-unit.source: Check value of JavaScript property
trans-unit.target: 檢查 JavaScript 屬性的值

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.
trans-unit.target: 檢查是否值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>是<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>或<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A>傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.
trans-unit.target: 檢查是否<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>是<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>或<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>。

trans-unit.source: The device capability of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 裝置功能的<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A>傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.
trans-unit.target: 檢查是否<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>是<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11>或<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>。

trans-unit.source: N/A
trans-unit.target: N/A

trans-unit.source: Returns the key to use to submit the event argument.
trans-unit.target: 傳回要用來提交事件引數的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The specified text writer.
trans-unit.target: 指定的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Optional event argument to pass.

trans-unit.source: Renders a reference to a postback event appropriately for the target device.
trans-unit.target: 呈現合適的目標裝置回傳事件的參考。

trans-unit.source: Renders the header associated with postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 呈現與回傳相關聯的標頭。

trans-unit.source: For browsers that support script, this includes a script block to perform postback.
trans-unit.target: 針對支援指令碼的瀏覽器，這包含執行回傳的指令碼區塊。
